Summary: Right away we knew it had no wings.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were putting together a xmas gift for the grandkids.A tramprleane.A strom was over and we were watching the clouds break up from time to time.They were moving vary fast.when another hole in the clouds opened up we were looking up,not all at once but when my daughter in law saw the object.We looked up to see the clouds open a little and in the hole of the clouds was this object moving slow.High up but not to high to hide the fact,that it had no wings.No sound,plus it was moving at a course that if it was a blimp it was moving at stright line against the wind.I had a camer but I couldn't get it to foucus fast enough before it went back in the clouds.We knew what it was right away, a UFO.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around December 25th 2006
